~ versionCheck

- firstJoinMessages
- holograms
- portals
- votifier
- shulkerBackpack
- skin
- deathMessages

[CONFIG]
Economy:
  Enabled: true
ReSpawn:
  Specific:
    world-lobby:
    - anchor
    - bedLocation
    - spawn
    - homeLocation
    - worldSpawn
Spawners:
  Place:
    Enabled: false
WorldLimits:
  FlyAboveRoofLimitations:
  - world-lobby-256
  SpawnReasons:
    world-lobby:
    - None
purge:
  PlayerData:
    SourceFolder: world-nazarick/playerdata
    DestinationFolder: world-nazarick/playerdata_backup
  PlayerStats:
    SourceFolder: world-nazarick/stats
    DestinationFolder: world-nazarick/stats_backup
  PlayerAdvancements:
    SourceFolder: world-nazarick/Advancements
    DestinationFolder: world-nazarick/Advancements_backup
Time:
  TimeSpeed:
    world-lobby:
      Enabled: false
      day: 600
      sunset: 90
      night: 420
      sunrise: 90
RandomTeleportation:
  Worlds:
    world-lobby:
      Enabled: false
      MaxRange: 1000
      MinRange: 500
      CenterX: 0
      CenterZ: 0
      Circle: false
      IgnoreWater: true
      IgnoreLava: true
      minY: 0
      maxY: 256
